value:
Warrior priestesses of old once wore
outfits just like this.$k$pAppropriate garb when locked in a
battle for the fate of the world, don't
you think?

I hope that the world can one day
find peace and that those precious to
me remain safe...$k$pThat's my prayer to Mila.

Alm entrusted me with this sword.
Ever since childhood, he's been
extremely kind...as well as brave.

I sensed someone calling out to me.
No, not just one person...but many.
What could that mean?

Prayer and reflection are important,
but as a warrior priestess I must keep
up my sword training as well.$k$pI wonder if someone here would be
willing to play the role of opponent...

I've come to check up on you in
place of $Nf.$k$pAre you getting along as usual?

Such strength would be impossible
without everyone's support.

There's nothing wrong with steady
progress. Don't you agree?

Oh, how unfortunate... I must have
lost my usual stride.

Thank you so much. Your trust in me
shall be rewarded.

I am Celica, a warrior priestess in
service to the goddess Mila. I heard a
voice calling out to me... Was it you?

It may be odd for a warrior priestess
to admit this, but...I do not enjoy
fighting.$k$pIf it were up to me, I would never
hurt another living soul.$k$pHowever, if something or someone
important to me needs defending, I
have no choice but to fight.$k$pI must sound like such a hypocrite...
Do you think poorly of me?$k$pYou say I'm a truly kind person?
N-no, I disagree... Not long ago, I
angered someone very close to me.$k$pHis only wrongdoing was casting his
own safety aside so he could fight for
his full convictions without hesitation.$k$pIn fact, you remind me of him... Just a
little. Perhaps that's why I'm willing
to fight to protect you.$k$pIf I stay by your side...then I'm sure
my reasons for fighting will become
clear.
Ha!
With this blow...!
Ugh!
Place your trust in me!
Your feelings give me strength!
By Mila's grace!
Guide my hand!
No... Alm...
Uhmm...
Warrior priestesses of old wore outfits just like this. Do you think it suits me?
Oh! You startled me. You like playing tricks, huh? The truth is...I do, too.
In order to protect Mila, a warrior priestess must be adept with both magic and the sword.
This sword is a curious one. It can be wielded by royalty alone.
No matter the distance between us, it feels like Alm is right by my side.
Oh, Alm... No matter where I am, I always find myself thinking of you. Are you thinking of me?
You are this world's hope. By protecting you, I'll help keep the darkness at bay.
We're all right.
Hmm...
I'll clear a path.
